summary: Ok so the post credit added stuff was a 5 minute mini doc on Stan Lee and his cameos throughout the entire MCU (even behind the...
body: Ok so the post credit added stuff was a 5 minute mini doc on Stan Lee and his cameos throughout the entire MCU (even behind the scenes footage fron the first Iron Man); a Professor Hulk deleted scene that was like 2 minutes long; and like 2 minutes sneak peak to Far From Home that was actually boring to watch lmao

summary: So, I’m curious. If (in Infinty War) Gamora was sacrificed for the stone, and Nebula (in Endgame) was able to go back in time,...
body:
So, I’m curious. If (in Infinty War) Gamora was sacrificed for the stone, and Nebula (in Endgame) was able to go back in time, AND bring back Gamora to the present, why wasn’t anyone able to go back in time to bring a Natasha from the past?

WHY? Someone, please answer me.

reblog.comment:
So, I’m curious. If (in Infinty War) Gamora was sacrificed for the stone, and Nebula (in Endgame) was able to go back in time, AND bring back Gamora to the present, why wasn’t anyone able to go back in time to bring a Natasha from the past?

WHY? Someone, please answer me.

trail.content_raw:
So, I’m curious. If (in Infinty War) Gamora was sacrificed for the stone, and Nebula (in Endgame) was able to go back in time, AND bring back Gamora to the present, why wasn’t anyone able to go back in time to bring a Natasha from the past?

WHY? Someone, please answer me.
trail.content:
So, I’m curious. If (in Infinty War) Gamora was sacrificed for the stone, and Nebula (in Endgame) was able to go back in time, AND bring back Gamora to the present, why wasn’t anyone able to go back in time to bring a Natasha from the past?

WHY? Someone, please answer me.

his body has ALWAYS BEEN A JOKE
summary:
I STILL DON'T GET THE TUBBY-THOR HATE
So he fell into a depressive spiral and ate too much grease and drank too much beer and...
body:
I STILL DON’T GET THE TUBBY-THOR HATE

So he fell into a depressive spiral and ate too much grease and drank too much beer and now looks EXACTLY LIKE EVERYONE IN THE KITCHEN WHERE I WORK he still gets his crap together gets off the couch and goes to kick Thanos’s chin

“BUT IT WAS PLAYED FOR LAUGHS” so was his stone-chiseled body in every other movie, every time, every single time, people go in expecting to see the sculpted god of the Ninja Turtles but suddenly he’s not there, yeah, that’s a sight gag, but guess who still has a pirate and an angel for his parents?

THOR.

And I love him so much.

summary: Wife ( @natashalieromanov ) and I made a list of couples, romantic and platonic, that deserve the bonus feature in Endgame...
body:
Wife ( @natashalieromanov ) and I made a list of couples, romantic and platonic, that deserve the bonus feature in Endgame Digtial Release more than St*ggy, because their ending was about how men love to take womens’ agencys away

  1. Pepper/Tony
  2. Rhodey and Tony
  3. Sam and Steve (and delve more into the scene of passing of the shield and a promotional move for the new mcu tv show)
  4. Natasha and Tony
  5. Tony and Morgan
  6. Scott and Cassie (maybe promotional move for ant man 3)
  7. Steve and Bucky
  8. Steve and Tony
  9. Sam and Bucky (and it’s a promotional move for their tv show)
  10. Steve and Natasha
  11. Clint and Natasha
  12. Wanda and Clint (could be a promotional move for her tv show)

summary: Nelle sale UCI Cinemas la versione con scene inedite di Avengers: Endgame
title: Nelle sale UCI Cinemas la versione con scene inedite di Avengers: Endgame
body:
Nelle sale UCI Cinemas la versione con scene inedite di Avengers: Endgame

Continua il conto alla rovescia che porterà alla nuove release di Avengers: Endgame nelle sale italiane. Quest’oggi è tempo di parlare dell’evento riproposto dalla sale UCI Cinemas.

Come oramai è noto a tutti i fan Marvel, il cinecomic dei record Avengers: Endgame tornerà nelle sale italiane, e quindi anche in quelle del circuito UCI Cinemas, il prossimo 4 luglio. La nuova versione porterà con…

summary: Now Playing: “Avengers: Endgame” in Select Theaters (6/28/2019)
title: Now Playing: “Avengers: Endgame” in Select Theaters (6/28/2019)
body:
Do not adjust your internet feed or monitor screen because you are not at all imagining things. Yes, “Avengers: Endgame” is a film that has already been released and actually just completed its first box-office run on 6/20. The film was nothing short of a blockbuster draw and has brought in $2.751 billion dollars in ticket sales since opening. It is listed as the second highest grossing film of…

summary: ‘Avengers: Endgame’ Blu-Ray Will Feature Six Deleted Scenes
title: ‘Avengers: Endgame’ Blu-Ray Will Feature Six Deleted Scenes
excerpt: This Blu-Ray is gonna be pretty packed.
description:
Avengers: Endgame is set to make its final stand against James Cameron‘s Avatar in a fight for box-office supremacy this coming weekend with a special re-release. The re-release is said to include a special intro from the Russo Brothers, a sneak peek from Spider-Man: Far From Home and an unfinished deleted scene which brings us to the Endgame Blu-ray coming out next month. It’s currently being reported Blu-ray will feature not one but six deleted scenes:

[Read More]
